definition[0]: an innovative idea or way of doing something is new, different, and better than those that existed before
example[0]: an innovative approach to language teaching
example[1]: innovative schemes for recycling waste materials
definition[1]: using clever new ideas and methods
definition[2]: an innovative product, method, process etc is new, different, and better than those that existed before

example[4]: We supply goods to customers who want innovative design.
example[5]: an innovative approach to problem solving
